translations: 钓鱼；琵琶鱼；钓鱼者；用不正当手段谋取好处的人

sentences.sentence: An expert angler was casting his line and catching a fish every time.
sentences.translation: 一名垂钓高手每次抛出鱼线都能钓到一条鱼。

sentences.sentence: There's an angler fish at the bottom of the ocean that has a rod sticking up from the top of its head with a lure to capture other fish.
sentences.translation: 在海底中生活着一种琵琶鱼，它的头顶有一根突出的杆，带有用来捕获其他鱼类的诱饵。
